mapper.sql: id as `key`, created_by as createdBy, created_date as createdDate, last_modify_by as lastModifyBy, last_modify_date as lastModifyDate
mapper.select: select t1.id as `key`, t1.id, t1.`name` as `name`, t4.menuIds, t4.menuName, t2.name AS createdByName, t1.created_date AS createdDate, t3.name AS lastModifyByName, t1.last_modify_date AS lastModifyDate from t_role t1 left join t_user t2 on t1.created_by = t2.id left join t_user t3 on t1.last_modify_by = t3.id left join (select rm.`role_id` as roleId, group_concat(rm.`menu_id`) as menuIds, group_concat(m.`name`) as menuName from `t_role_menu` rm,`t_menu` m where rm.`menu_id`=m.`id` group by rm.`role_id`) as t4 on t1.`id`=t4.roleId
